tl.GUI

Class TGUIComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • tl.GUI.TGUIComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<TGUIComponent>, TGUIInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TButton, TButtonToggle, TContainer, TLabel, TListBox, TSlider, TTextBox

    public class TGUIComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements TGUIInterface, java.lang.Comparable<TGUIComponent>
    TGUIComponent is the base class from which all other TGUIComponents derive from.
    The TGUIComponent can be inherited to create almost any other user defined TGUI.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Callum Nichols

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(int button,
                int x,
                int y)
        Description copied from interface: TGUIInterface
        Used to update upon a mouse button being pressed down.
        Is usually called before mouseReleased(int button, int x, int y).
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface TGUIInterface
        Parameters:
        button - - The button ID that is being pressed. 0 - LMB, 1 - RMB, 2 - MMB
        x - - The x co-ordinate that the button was pressed on.
        y - - The y co-ordinate that the button was pressed on.
        See Also:
        TGUIInterface.mouseReleased(int, int, int)

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(int button,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Description copied from interface: TGUIInterface
        Used to update upon a mouse button being released.
        Is usually called after mousePressed(int button, int x, int y).
        Specified by:
        mouseReleased in interface TGUIInterface
        Parameters:
        button - - The button ID that is being pressed. 0 - LMB, 1 - RMB, 2 - MMB
        x - - The x co-ordinate that the button was pressed on.
        y - - The y co-ordinate that the button was pressed on.
        See Also:
        TGUIInterface.mousePressed(int, int, int)

      • mouseWheelMoved

        public void mouseWheelMoved(int change)
        Description copied from interface: TGUIInterface
        Used to update upon the middle mouse wheel being scrolled in any direction.
        Specified by:
        mouseWheelMoved in interface TGUIInterface
        Parameters:
        change - - The length in degrees that the mouse wheel moved. 0-360 = north, 0--360 = south

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(int key,
              char c)
        Description copied from interface: TGUIInterface
        Used to update upon a keyboard button being pressed down.
        Is usually called before keyReleased(int key, char c);
        Specified by:
        keyPressed in interface TGUIInterface
        Parameters:
        key - - The keyboard button ID that is being pressed.
        c - - The character that the keyboard button represents (if any).
        See Also:
        TGUIInterface.keyReleased(int, char)
